snippet: Ryan McMillan, 21, a sophomore at the University of North Texas, was killed by a campus police officer responding to a call about a man knocking out car windows.
abstract: University of North Texas student Ryan McMillan is fatally shot by  campus police officer after advancing towards officer holding ax; unidentified officer has been put on leave pending results of investigation by Texas Ranger Division and the Denton Police Department.
lead_paragraph: Ryan McMillan, 21, a sophomore at the University of North Texas, was killed by a campus police officer responding to a call about a man knocking out car windows.

headline.main: Texas Student Wielding Ax Is Shot Dead
headline.print_headline: Texas Student, 21, Wielding Ax Is Shot Dead by Campus Police
